intro: Sibbaldianthe orientalis, commonly known as the oriental star-of-Bethlehem, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of southern and eastern Asia. Sibbaldianthe orientalis is also valued for its ability to attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies.
